name: Cast Armor
desc:
The ship's armor is made of few cast elements with rigid protrusions, granting unparalleled stability and restistance. The general effectiveness of the ship's armor is therefore increased by %s and the ship's hull is able to withstand stellar phenomena up to %s.
This comes at the inability to install similar mods or impromptu hangars.
short: Protects the ship from stellar phenomena and energy weapons.
